name: Troops to Teachers Grant Program
objective: The goal is to facilitate employment of eligible members of the armed forces in schools identified in 10 U.S.C. 1154.
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals

results.description:
1,046 troops have been hired to be teachers
 1049
550 troops to be hired as teachers

19 Education activities provided funding to assisting separated service members with education requirements to obtain teaching certification.  Helped transitioning military veterans who were honorably discharged and have a bachelor's degree or alternative training become teachers.
Helping service members and veterans become certified and employed as teachers in K-12 schools.
Provided counseling and referral services for participants to help them meet education and licensing requirements to teach and subsequently helps them secure a teaching position.

rules_regulations: 10 U.S.C. 1154; 2 CFR 200; DoD Grant and Agreement Regulations (DoDGARs)
